attributes.action: SAve Ashford and St Peters hospitals from any reduction in services and invest far more into expanding services in real terms
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ashford and St Peters, split between Surrey and Middlesaex provide a wide range of acute services, under threat by cost-cutting, resulting in a decline in moral and confidance in the future of the services.
St Peters A&E sees over 110,000 patients a year, pressured further by the pointless closure of Ashfords own Emergency Department.
We wish to see our hospital gorw and expand with more beds and staff not less!!!!
